briefdescription.para: Generate the vertices of a reference Axes; Use red for x-axis, green for y-axis, blue for z-axis Then generate the VBO/IBO and store them in Mesh object.

simplesect.para: Pointer to mesh storing VBO/IBO of reference axes

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &meshName, Color color, float lengthX, float lengthZ, int repeat)
memberdef.name: GenerateQuad

briefdescription.para: Generate the vertices of a quad; Use color for each vertex Then generate the VBO/IBO and store them in Mesh object.

simplesect.para: Pointer to mesh storing VBO/IBO of quad

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &meshName, Color color, float lengthX, float lengthY, int repeat)
memberdef.name: GenerateXYQuad

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &meshName, Color color, float lengthX, float lengthY, float lengthZ, int repeat)
memberdef.name: GenerateCubeOnPlane

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &meshName, Color color, float lengthX, float lengthY, float lengthZ, int repeat)
memberdef.name: GenerateCube

briefdescription.para: Generate the vertices of a cube; Use color for each vertex Then generate the VBO/IBO and store them in Mesh object.

simplesect.para: Pointer to mesh storing VBO/IBO of cube

briefdescription.para: Generate the vertices of a circle; Use color for each vertex Then generate the VBO/IBO and store them in Mesh object.

simplesect.para: Pointer to mesh storing VBO/IBO of circle

briefdescription.para: Generate the vertices of a ring; Use color for each vertex Then generate the VBO/IBO and store them in Mesh object.

simplesect.para: Pointer to mesh storing VBO/IBO of ring

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &meshName, Color color, unsigned numStack, unsigned numSlice, float radius)
memberdef.name: GenerateSphere

briefdescription.para: Generate the vertices of a sphere; Use color for each vertex Then generate the VBO/IBO and store them in Mesh object.

parameterdescription.para: - number of vertical components(stacks) of sphere
- number of horizontal components(slices) of sphere

simplesect.para: Pointer to mesh storing VBO/IBO of sphere

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &meshName, Color color, unsigned numStack, unsigned numSlice, float radius)
memberdef.name: GenerateHemi

briefdescription.para: Generate the vertices of a hemisphere; Use color for each vertex Then generate the VBO/IBO and store them in Mesh object.

parameterdescription.para: - number of vertical components(stacks) of hemisphere
- number of horizontal components(slices) of hemisphere

simplesect.para: Pointer to mesh storing VBO/IBO of hemisphere

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &meshName, Color color, unsigned numStack, unsigned numSlice, float radius)
memberdef.name: GenerateCone

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &meshName, Color color, unsigned numSlice, float height, float radius)
memberdef.name: GenerateCylinder

briefdescription.para: Generate the vertices of a cylinder; Use color for each vertex Then generate the VBO/IBO and store them in Mesh object.

parameterdescription.para: - number of sides the cylinder has

simplesect.para: Pointer to mesh storing VBO/IBO of cylinder

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &meshName, Color colorBot, Color colorTop, unsigned numSlice, float height, float radius)
memberdef.name: GenerateCylinder

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &meshName, Color color, unsigned numStack, unsigned numSlice, float height, float radius)
memberdef.name: GenerateCapsule

briefdescription.para: Generate the vertices of a capsule (cylinder with hemisphere at top & bottom); Use color for each vertex Then generate the VBO/IBO and store them in Mesh object.

parameterdescription.para: - number of vertical components(stacks) of capsule
- number of horizontal components(slices) of capsule

simplesect.para: Pointer to mesh storing VBO/IBO of capsule

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &meshName, Color color, unsigned numStack, unsigned numSlice, float outerR, float innerR)
memberdef.name: GenerateTorus

briefdescription.para: Provides methods to generate mesh of different shapes.
